targets.query:
from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] !~ /^(lo|docker|veth|br-).*$/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] !~ /^(loop|dm-).*$/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> last()

panels.description: Shows ZFS pool health from Telegraf exec plugin. Check measurement 'zpool_health_health' for data.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_health_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "health_numeric")
  |> last()

panels.title: ZFS Pool Health Status

targets.query:
from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "capacity")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fragmentation")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool" or r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nread" or r["_field"] == "nwritten" or r["_field"] == "read_bytes" or r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "arcstats_size" or r["_field"] == "arcstats_c" or r["_field"] == "arcstats_c_min" or r["_field"] == "arcstats_c_max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "health_ok")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == true then 1 else 0 }))

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool" or r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rops" or r["_field"] == "wops" or r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power_on_hours")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp_c")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "health_ok" or r["_field"] == "temp_c" or r["_field"] == "power_on_hours" or r["_field"] == "wear_leveling_count" or r["_field"] == "percent_lifetime_remain")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time", "device", "model"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
      Device: r.device,
      Model: r.model,
      Health: if exists r.health_ok then r.health_ok else false,
      Temperature: if exists r.temp_c then r.temp_c else 0,
      "Power On Hours": if exists r.power_on_hours then r.power_on_hours else 0,
      "Wear %": if exists r.wear_leveling_count then float(v: r.wear_leveling_count) else if exists r.percent_lifetime_remain then 100.0 - float(v: r.percent_lifetime_remain) else 0.0
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["Device", "Model", "Health", "Temperature", "Power On Hours", "Wear %"])
  |> sort(columns: ["Device"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_attribute")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "Reallocated_Sector_Ct" or r["name"] == "Current_Pending_Sector" or r["name"] == "Offline_Uncorrectable")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "raw_value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
